attributes.action: Charge a bond for all economic migrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any person wishing to work or move to this country should be required to post a bond of, say, £10k, to cover any subsequent cost of there occupancy. The bond is to be repayed in full after two years full employment as they have, by default, demonstrated their contribution to society by their actions
